TopicTitle: Great History of Space Stations Special

Articles.Content:
I know this may be a bit long to watch at 50min but I would not waste your time I promise. This is probably the best general overview on the history of Earth's space stations I have seen! Goes through Salyut to the ISS and does an excellent job with the visuals.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Or4bwKCo6Cw

I've seen this before, to be honest I found it quite bad for a few factors like missing important stuff out. Then again it was made for the general public. I will admit there was interesting technical stuff in it.

I've seen this before, to be honest I found it quite bad for a few factors like missing important stuff out. Then again it was made for the general public. I will admit there was interesting technical stuff in it.

Just curious, what were you hoping to see?

Just curious' date=' what were you hoping to see?[/quote']

Oh well I wasn't expecting much (being an american mainstream documentary) however I found it watered down. But I guess that the problem is me having too much knowledge on the subject hehe. I guess I was hoping for something cool I didn't know.

On the another note I would recommend other B,B,B documentarys such as the three gorges dam one.
